p: The Artemisia arborescens L. essential oil showed significant antiviral activity against Herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) (Sinico et al. 2005). Peppermint oil, the essential oil of Mentha piperita, exhibited high levels of virucidal activity against HSV-1 and HSV-2, and it is also active against an acyclovir resistant strain of HSV-1 (HSV-1-ACV res) (Schuhmacher et al. 2003).
